column2: Crushed pepper and smoky charcoal, the hush of an art gallery Our premium silicone suction bowl in Peppercorn comes with a silicone lid & is perfect for babies, toddlers, and kids, at home and on the go. Made of 100% platinum silicone Strong suction base and easy tab suction release Ounce markings for easy food prep and feeding Freezer, microwave oven, and dishwasher safe; oven safe up to 425° F BPA, lead, and phthalate-free Approximate bowl dimensions and capacity: 4 ½\" (w) x 2 ¼\" (h); 9.5 fl. oz. Coordinates beautifully with our Peppercorn Silicone Suction Plate Made in Korea
